title: Exploring the mythical Col du Tourmalet ahead of historic Tour de France Femmes debut
content:
A study of the most legendary of climbs, which will be the highlight and big showdown of Saturday's stage up to the 2,110m summit.

Read the full article at Exploring the mythical Col du Tourmalet ahead of historic Tour de France Femmes debut on Velo.
author: sstokes
